get.description: Get the current authenticated user's profile.

patch.description: Update the current authenticated user's profile.

post.description: Verify Clerk Svix signature and synchronize heart records for user lifecycle events.

get.description: Get the authenticated heart profile including persona, expectations, and screening questions.

put.description: Update mutable heart profile fields for the authenticated heart.
Update persona settings used by the heart's AI avatar.
Update dating expectations used for suitor evaluation.

get.description: List screening questions configured for the authenticated heart.

post.description: Add a screening question for the authenticated heart profile.

put.description: Update a specific screening question for the authenticated heart.

delete.description: Delete a screening question from the authenticated heart profile.

post.description: Reorder screening questions by submitting a complete ordered list of question IDs.

get.description: Get public shareable interview link metadata for the authenticated heart.

post.description: Activate or deactivate the authenticated heart's public link.

get.description: Get dashboard statistics for the authenticated heart.
List session summaries for the authenticated heart dashboard.
Get transcript, emotion data, and scoring details for a specific session.
Get limited public profile information for a heart by slug.

post.description: Register a suitor before starting the interview flow.
Initialize a new interview session for a suitor and heart.

get.description: Get current processing state for a session.
Poll final verdict and score breakdown for a completed session.
Get available date booking slots (placeholder data for Milestone 1).

post.description: Create a booking confirmation for a successful suitor session.
